title: Video: Youth Lagoon – Dropla (Pitchfork.tv Session)
body:
Despite being unceremoniously cut after only two songs at the Pitchfork SXSW day party (due to time constraints, not quality), there’s no doubting the support that [Pitchfork](http://pitchfork.com/news/50073-watch-youth-lagoon-perform-dropla-for-pitchforktv/) have provided **Youth Lagoon** throughout his blossoming career. This latest session of recent album track _Dropla_ not only serves to mend some bridges, but also to complete the expansion of Youth Lagoon, from a timid, understated performer to a group of musicians fully capable of wowing stadium sized crowds. Check out _Dropla_ performed exclusively for Pitchfork.tv, as well as three UK tour dates presented by Now Wave, after the jump.

MONDAY 15th JULY  
LEEDS BRUDENELL SOCIAL CLUB  
TUESDAY 16th JULY  
MANCHESTER GORILLA  
THURSDAY 18th JULY  
BIRMINGHAM HARE AND HOUNDS
